recipe.title: Corn on the Cob with Mint-Feta Butter
ingredients: 8 large ears of corn, shucked, each cob cut crosswise into 4 pieces
instructions: Stir together butter, feta, mint, and a rounded 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large bowl.
Cook corn in a large pot of boiling water until crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Transfer with tongs to butter mixture and toss until well coated.
